row.process:
!! !:set &ordner# = "TEST/PRAN/INCLUDE" !!! !:set &hnd# = prep_process_filename("DA100PC07", "/opt/uc4/import/testjp/*.xml",,,,,"UC_LOGIN=LOGIN.MV") !:process &hnd# !: set &datei# = get_process_line(&hnd#) !: print &datei# !: set &ret# = import(&datei#, &ordner#, "1") !: p 'RC:', &ret# !: if &ret# > '0' !: p 'Fehler: ', &ret# !: modify_state status_text = "Fehler beim Import" !: modify_state RETCODE=50 !: endif !:endprocess !:close_process &hnd# !! : set &ret# = import(fail, fail, "1") :ON_ERROR ABEND
!: process &ret# !: !: endprocess
